column2: [From.GetFullName], a witcher in your employment has expressed his desire to leave your court.
He can surely stay for a while longer.
Some gold will change his mind.
He can leave if he wishes to.
[From.GetFullName] will stay in your court for a while longer.
Gold can change any man's mind, [From.GetFullName] accepted your gift and will stayin your court for a while longer.
[From.GetFullName] has left your court to seek employment elsewhere.
A witcher has arrived in your court offering his services.
I have no need for witcher.
You have a job that witcher could help with.
All witchers currently alive will be listed.
